detailsData.title: Excellence and Expertise
detailsData.content: Decades of experience at world class law firms, winning hundreds of cases.

detailsData.title: Team Collaboration
detailsData.content: Weekly legal team meetings ensure expertise is shared across all cases.

detailsData.title: Client-Centered Approach
detailsData.content: Strategies designed to meet the specific needs of each client.

valueProp: We specialize in creating solutions for your legal issues. In litigation, we develop the evidence to win. In regulatory matters, we formulate strategies to achieve your objectives. In contract matters, corporate disputes, partnership disputes and other business matters, we deploy tactical advice to overcome the obstacles. We design our strategies to meet your needs.
CTA: Welcome to FINNERTY LAW OFFICES, INC.

testimonalData.text: We have worked with Kathleen Finnerty for more than 20 years. She is our go-to lawyer when only the best will do.
testimonalData.author: Chuck Hansen

testimonalData.text: Our regulatory and litigation matters are extremely complex and multifaceted. Kathleen handles them with grace, strength and intelligence. We are proud to have her on our team.
testimonalData.author: Eric Scruggs

testimonalData.text: Kathleen is our ace-in-the-hole. She is smart, dedicated and tenacious in the pursuit of our interests.
testimonalData.author: Gleb Tabachnik
